result.eng: I'll see you at three o'clock.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlog
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlog
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag a trí a chlogI'll see you at three o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag a trí a ċlogI'll see you at three o'clock.

result.eng: Excuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal an ón ċloċaois ṫúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?

result.eng: She will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ga: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.orig: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.html: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!

result.eng: I'll see you on Friday night, God willing.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú

result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam goidé a ḋéanfainn aċ go bé ṫúI don't know what I'd do without you.
